entries.title: The Awakening of Power
entries.preview: Upon our arrival in the outer territories of Drakkenheim, I have taken to documenting the intricacies of this fractured realm. The city is as much a labyrinth of peril as it is a testament to our species' follies...

entries.title: Into the Cursed Ruins
entries.preview: We have established our base of operations in Emberwood Village, renting a modest dwelling approximately two hours' ride from the dreaded perimeter of Drakkenheim...

entries.title: A Brother's Desperate Plea
entries.date: Eigth Day of Mirtul, Year 1492 DR (January 22, 2025)
entries.preview: I can barely contain my excitement as I write these words – we have grown considerably in our magical and martial prowess! The experiences of recent days have strengthened not only my understanding of the arcane arts...

entries.title: The Price of Knowledge
entries.date: Tenth Day of Mirtul, Year 1492 DR
entries.preview: Today I learned that some knowledge comes with a terrible price. We discovered the fate of Archmage Thessarian, and it serves as a sobering reminder of the dangers that await those who delve too deeply into the mysteries of magic...

entries.title: Bonds Forged in Fire
entries.date: Fifteenth Day of Mirtul, Year 1492 DR
entries.preview: As I write these words by the flickering light of our campfire, I realize that this adventure has changed me in ways I never expected. Not just in terms of magical knowledge – though I have certainly learned much – but in my understanding of companionship and trust...
